events.message: The customer has reported an auto accident involving their vehicle that occurred on April 30th. The claim has been officially filed for processing.
The claim was categorised under Auto Accident after reviewing the initial report and keywords associated with a car collision.
An agent with experience in handling vehicle-related claims has been assigned to manage and investigate the customer's auto accident claim.
The customer has been sent a confirmation email acknowledging receipt of the auto accident claim and outlining the next steps to follow.
The insurance company has requested additional documents including a police report, photos of the vehicle damage, and repair estimates.
The customer has submitted all requested documents, including the accident police report and several clear images of the vehicle collision damage.
The investigation into the auto accident claim has commenced, with the assigned agent reviewing submitted evidence and verifying statements.
Investigation has concluded confirming the details of the collision and liability assignment as per the evidence and witness accounts.
A proposed settlement offer covering vehicle repair costs and rental reimbursement has been sent to the customer for their review.
The customer responded positively to the proposed settlement offer and expressed satisfaction with the timely handling of their claim.
The claim has been formally approved by the claims manager following customer acceptance of the settlement proposal.
The settlement payment has been issued to the customer's bank account, covering the agreed amount for vehicle repairs and additional expenses.
The auto accident claim case was officially closed after confirming the customer received the settlement and was satisfied with the resolution.
